message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $950,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and potential.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer. I'm willing to negotiate, but $850,000 is a bit below what I had in mind. How about we meet in the middle at $900,000? This reflects the true value of the product.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $850,000 and $900,000. How about we settle on $875,000?
